name: Billiard Table: Mini Pool PRO
description:
The annual Pool Masters Challenge is starting tonight! Prove yourself as the best billiards player and beat all your rivals from your phone. Go for the striped or the solid balls - it’s up to you! –, but DON’T POCKET THE BLACK ONE YET!

Create your very own profile and play against random users from any part of the planet, your friends or even try your pool skills against the AI players. Become the best player ever!

Select your favorite tables and unlock new ones when you win. Will you be the best player of the year?

FEATURES:
- Realistic Features
- Unlockable Tables
- 4 Different Multiplayer modes
- Custom Difficulty
- Easy to play

Start the competition now! Wait no more and download the game!
